# Twardosławice

Twardosławice  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Grabica, within Piotrków County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Grabica,  north-west of Piotrków Trybunalski, and  south of the regional capital Łódź.
